name: Fresh juice
description: Life can be sweet and sour, like lemon juice. Appearing like some very sweet juice from the outside, while the inside can actually be really sour. Representing how people can make their life look amazing on the outside, yet they can struggle a lot in private. ‘Fresh juice’ is the fourth nft in the lemon collection which tells a story in 6 illustrations. Digital artwork made in 2021 by Camila Trapasso (camamblo).
